item.title: 软银将为日本超级计算机提供首批 Nvidia 新芯片
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.）将成为首家采用英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）新型 Blackwell 设计制造超级计算机的客户，此举旨在满足急于在人工智能领域迎头赶上的中国日益增长的需求。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. will be the first Nvidia Corp. customer to build a supercomputer based on the chipmaker’s new Blackwell design, a move to meet growing demand in a country eager to catch up in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 精神公司即将达成破产协议，股东将被一扫而空
item.description: 在与竞争对手边疆集团控股公司（Frontier Group Holdings Inc.【原文：Spirit Airlines Inc. is closing in on a deal with creditors that would restructure its crushing debt load in bankruptcy court after discussions for a tie-up with rival Frontier Group Holdings Inc. fell apart.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后比特币涨幅超过 30% 后降温
item.description: 随着交易员们评估美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币的言辞支持对市场的影响，比特币的飙升已经暂停。【原文：A surge in Bitcoin has paused as traders assess the remaining market impact of President-elect Donald Trump’s rhetorical support for crypto.】

item.title: 中国三年来首次发行美元债券
item.description: 中国开始在沙特阿拉伯销售美元债券，这标志着该国自 2021 年以来首次以美元销售债务。【原文：China started marketing dollar bonds in Saudi Arabia, marking the country’s first debt sale in the US currency since 2021.】

item.title: Swiggy 首次公开募股考验印度快速配送企业的需求
item.description: Swiggy Ltd. 的股票将于周三在孟买开始交易，这标志着投资者对印度新兴快速电子商务行业兴趣的一次考验。【原文：Swiggy Ltd.’s shares are set to start trading in Mumbai on Wednesday, marking a test for investor interest in India’s burgeoning quick-commerce sector.】

item.title: 中国向全球银行家征求意见以提升市场信心
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国证券监管机构已加快了与全球银行互动的频率，将以往每季度一次的讨论加强到有时每周一次或临时询问，旨在收集对近期刺激措施的看法。【原文：China’s securities regulator has ratcheted up the frequency of interactions with global banks, intensifying what had been quarterly discussions to sometimes weekly or ad-hoc queries aimed at gathering perspectives on recent stimulus measures, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DirecTV 计划取消 Dish 交易，除非债务交换问题得到解决
item.description: 如果债券持有人不同意债务交换，DirecTV 打算在 10 天内终止对 Dish Network Corp. 的收购计划。【原文：DirecTV intends to terminate its planned acquisition of Dish Network Corp. in 10 days if bondholders don’t agree to a debt exchange.】

item.title: 澳大利亚工资增长放缓，凸显物价压力减轻
item.description: 澳大利亚第三季度工资增长放缓，反映出整个经济的物价压力有所缓解，并强化了下一步利率将下调的预期。【原文：Australia’s wage growth slowed in the third quarter, reflecting an easing in price pressures across the economy and reinforcing expectations that the next move in interest rates will be down.】

item.title: Pictet 在全球寻找不受特朗普政策议程影响的资产
item.description: Pictet Asset Management SA 正在加大对印度和其他新兴市场的投资，这家欧洲基金公司认为这些市场受唐纳德-特朗普政策的影响较小。【原文：Pictet Asset Management SA is boosting its investment in India and other emerging markets that the European fund company deems would be less affected by Donald Trump’s policies.】

item.title: 淡马锡信托向汇丰控股的泰科玛能源公司投资 5000 万美元
item.description: 淡马锡信托公司同意向汇丰银行资产管理公司拥有的一家日本太阳能公司投资 5000 万美元。【原文：Temasek Trust agreed to invest $50 million in an HSBC Asset Management-owned Japanese solar energy company.】

item.title: 美国 CPI 将再现坚挺，美联储路径尚不明朗
item.description: 预测人员预计，美国消费者物价月度报告将显示基本通胀率第三个月保持坚挺，这将使美联储未来几个月的降息步伐成为争论的焦点。【原文：Forecasters expect a monthly report on US consumer prices to show a third month of firm underlying inflation, keeping the pace of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts in the coming months up for debate.】

item.title: Kasikorn AM 称，特朗普时代或将提振泰国和越南股市
item.description: 据该地区最大的基金管理公司之一称，泰国和越南将成为唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的 "最大受益者"。【原文：Thailand and Vietnam will be among the “biggest beneficiaries” of Donald Trump’s return to the White House, according to one of the largest fund managers in the region.】

item.title: 石油价格稳定在 11 月低点附近，需求前景备受关注
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）因中国经济放缓而再次下调预期后，石油需求前景成为关注焦点。【原文：Oil steadied neared its lowest level this month, with the outlook for demand in focus after OPEC reduced its projections again on China’s slowdown.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构就死亡抚恤金延迟问题起诉养老基金
item.description: 澳大利亚监管机构已对该国最大的养老基金之一 Cbus Super 提起民事处罚诉讼，原因是该公司在处理数千人的死亡抚恤金和保险索赔方面存在长期拖延。【原文：Australia’s regulator has filed civil penalty proceedings against one of the nation’s largest pension funds, Cbus Super, over lengthy delays in processing thousands of death benefits and insurance claims.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，边疆航空谈判失败，精神航空将面临破产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，在与边疆集团控股公司（Frontier Group Holdings Inc.【原文：Spirit Airlines Inc. is preparing to file for bankruptcy protection after merger talks with Frontier Group Holdings Inc. broke down, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 墨西哥预算计划包括为墨西哥石油公司债务提供 60 亿美元支持
item.description: 墨西哥计划在其 2025 年预算草案中为国有石油公司墨西哥石油公司预留约 60 亿美元，熟悉内情的人士称，这是政府继续支持这家负债累累的石油生产商的信号。【原文：Mexico plans to set aside about $6 billion for state oil company Petroleos Mexicanos in its 2025 draft budget, people familiar with the matter said, as the government signals continued support for the indebted oil producer.】

item.title: 压力增大，韩国锌业将就有争议的 18 亿美元股份计划做出决定
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.）董事会将于周三召开会议，决定是否继续执行一项价值 18 亿美元的股票出售计划。【原文：Korea Zinc Co.’s board will meet on Wednesday to decide whether or not to proceed with a $1.8 billion share sale plan which prompted a selloff in the stock and triggered an investigation by the country’s financial watchdog.】

item.title: 亚马逊将关闭由广告支持的流媒体电视服务 Freevee
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亚马逊公司正在关闭免费观看、广告支持的流媒体服务 Freevee，将其并入订阅型 Prime Video 产品。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is closing Freevee, the free-to-watch, advertising-supported streaming service, folding it into the subscription-based Prime Video product, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国通胀前债券下跌，利率押注暂缓：市场综述
item.description: 在可能进一步削弱对美联储降息步伐信心的关键通胀数据公布之前，国债收益率攀升，美元汇率创下两年新高。在美国股市强劲反弹后，亚洲股市将低开。【原文：Treasury yields climbed and the dollar hit a two-year high ahead of key inflation data that could further sap confidence in the pace of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts. Stocks in Asia are set to open lower after a breakneck US rally ran out of steam.】

item.title: 合作社负责人称，特朗普的大规模驱逐计划将损害农业发展
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要进行大规模驱逐，这有可能伤害到已经在劳动力短缺问题上苦苦挣扎的国内农业部门。【原文：President-Elect Donald Trump’s threat of mass deportations risks hurting the domestic agriculture sector already struggling with labor shortages.】

item.title: 汽车融资公司 Vroom 计划申请破产保护以重组债务
item.description: 汽车融资服务提供商 Vroom 公司周二发表声明称，计划根据破产法第 11 章向美国破产法院提交预包装重组申请。【原文：Automotive financing provider Vroom, Inc. plans to file a prepackaged reorganization under Chapter 11 in US bankruptcy court, according to a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西央行在雷亚尔下跌之际介入货币市场
item.description: 由于巴西国内的财政问题和全球风险资产的普遍下滑，雷亚尔受到重创，巴西央行正在介入货币市场。【原文：Brazil’s central bank is stepping into currency markets as the real has been battered by fiscal concerns at home and a broad slide in risk assets globally.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）又有新项目了：特朗普政府
item.description:
在向当选总统的竞选活动投入了至少1.32亿美元之后，这位世界首富即将把美国政府当作一个亏损的社交网络来对待。【原文：

After plowing at least $132 million into the president-elect’s campaign, the richest man in the world is about to treat the US government as if it were a money-losing social network.

】

item.title: IHeart 债券持有人集团准备挑战债务协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，一群 iHeartMedia 公司债券持有者打算对抗一项债务交换提议，这可能为恶意债务重组埋下伏笔。【原文：A group of iHeartMedia Inc. bondholders intends to fight a proposed debt exchange offer, potentially setting the stage for a hostile debt restructuring, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后交易员加大国债抛售押注
item.description: 由于预计唐纳德-特朗普承诺的政策将重燃通胀，并使美国利率居高不下，交易员们正加码押注国债市场将进一步下跌。【原文：Traders are loading up on bets for further losses in the Treasury market in anticipation that Donald Trump’s pledged policies will rekindle inflation and keep US interest rates high.】

item.title: 凯尔-巴斯称赞特朗普的中国鹰派是应对习近平威胁的 "现实主义者
item.description: 对冲基金资深人士凯尔.巴斯（Kyle Bass）对当选总统唐纳德.特朗普内阁有望任命具有强烈反华观点的官员表示欢迎，尽管这有可能使世界最大经济体之间的关系趋于紧张。【原文：The expected appointment of officials with strong anti-China views to President-elect Donald Trump’s cabinet was welcomed by hedge fund veteran Kyle Bass, even as it risks straining ties between the world’s largest economies.】

item.title: 大众 8 亿美元押注 Rivian 电动汽车技术
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）和 Rivian Automotive 公司任命了其价值数十亿美元的合资企业的领导人，并展示了一辆电动汽车原型，这表明了他们的承诺，即使在全球电动汽车需求疲软、即将上任的特朗普政府威胁要削减扶持政策的情况下也是如此。【原文：Volkswagen AG and Rivian Automotive Inc. named leaders for their multibillion-dollar joint venture and showcased a prototype electric vehicle, signaling their commitment even as global EV demand softens and the incoming Trump administration threatens to curtail supportive policies.】

item.title: 凯雷投资的 Veritas 公司与债权人达成 40 亿美元债务协议
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc.-backed Veritas US Inc. is closing in on a deal to restructure $4 billion of debt it owes next year, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: FanDuel 所有者 Flutter 超出销售预期，但对前景持谨慎态度
item.description: 美国体育博彩巨头 FanDuel 的运营商 Flutter Entertainment 公布的第三季度销售额超过了分析师的预期，但该公司警告称，第四季度的开局将十分艰难。【原文：Flutter Entertainment, operator of US sports betting giant FanDuel, reported third-quarter sales that beat analysts’ estimates but warned of a tough start to the current fourth quarter.】

item.title: 广告销售下滑，Spotify 用户数和利润率仍超预期
item.description: Spotify 技术公司（Spotify Technology SA）报告称，第三季度用户数量和利润率均有所增长，并表示较低的营销和人事成本帮助该音乐流媒体服务克服了艰难的广告环境。【原文：Spotify Technology SA reported third-quarter growth in subscribers and profit margins, saying lower marketing and personnel costs helped the music streaming service overcome a tough climate for advertising.】
